text:
National Educational Television and Radio Center
INTER-OFFICE MEMORANDUM
TO:
Diedrich Tietjen
cc: Harold Hill, NAEB
FROM:
Jim Robertson
SUBJECT:
TRAVEL EXPENSE FOR ETV WITNESSES
DATE:
September 22, 1961
Please make out a check for $667.78 in favor of the
National Association of Educational Broadcasters and mail
it to Harold Hill at the Washington address noted on the
attached letter.
This is our half of the expenses of witnesses in
connection with testimony on the Magnus on bill. While
we are not aware of any specific committment to share
this expense with NAEB, Mr. White and I have elected
to go along in view of our desire to cooperate with
NAEB in such Washington matters as this.
Since Mr. Hill is receiving a copy of this memo,
no cover letter will be needed.
Please charge to amount to account number
3-ll~l|l5-95 (Washington office, "meeting expense").
2 5 *961
i
